short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phần mềm treo và tự động Shopee Live

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tool for automation marketing for Shopee & Tiktok - Ecommerce Marketplace
1. Automation Livestream
- Automation start/end livestream session at https://live.shopee.vn/pc/setup
- Automation pin voucher / product in current livestream session
- Automation start special price duration in current livestream session
- Automation reply message from viewer in current livestream session

2. Automation Affiliate
- Auto fetch data KOL/KOC from shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto invite KOL/KOC join affiliate campaign
- Auto send direct message from shopee and tiktok to KOL/KOC

3. Automation Marketing
- Auto fetch perfomance data from shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto fetch ads data from  shopee.vn and tiktok.com
- Auto start flash sale slot for shopee.vn
